name: Mixed Reality Wild Animal Escape
description:
Similar to the Hauntify Mixed Reality game,  Wild Animal Escape features animals instead of ghosts for a different experience.

Mixed Reality Wild Animal Escape turns your multi floored house into an action game! Experience wild animals that will hunt you down. Collect golden statues to unlock placeable props. As you collect more statues the animals will increase their speed and difficulty. Play in both day and night modes!

Mixed Reality Wild Animal Escape can be played in any type of building including single or multistory! The player must set up their play space using the game's built in features to enhance their experience. With up to 500 x 500 meter area and a 100 meter max height tracking space used to set up your experience, the possibilities are endless! We want to give the player creative freedom to create an action game and place props around their environment. Some animals can be summoned in player defined spawn points and other animals appear in completely random locations around your house/playspace.

Mixed Reality Wild Animal Escape features fully dynamic AI that is capable of navigating your house with full occlusion. The different animal types will have unique behaviors.

IMPORTANT, before playing, make sure you read the instructions on how to set up your play space. Your experience will depend on how well you set up your play space and if you set up your headset to enable passthrough mode.

Please Note, this app is still very experimental, Future Oculus updates may impact the passthrough functionality of the game.

V34 now supported!

Optimized For Quest 2 (Best Performance)

I will keep updating the game to fix any bugs that are reported to me. New content with each update!

* In order to save your wall setup, once you place all of your walls, exit the app and do not continue! When you enter back into the app, your walls should be saved to the play space option you selected. hitting continue without save will erase any changes that you made in the play session*

You have 4 spots to save your setup in.

Mixed Reality Wild Animal Escape updates may impact your current saved room set up progress.

In order to save your setup, you must exit the app once you are done calibrating your walls and do not continue or your progress will be lost!

Downloads and Donations will help with future content!
